headline: Putting it all together, I'll structure it into a CSV format as specified. The first row is the header: "headline"
author: author
content: content. Then the data row with the extracted information enclosed in double quotes and separated by semicolons.

headline: El loco del martillo
author: Ismael Lazo, Vecino de San Luis
content: Hoy en día, uno pensaría que... Estoy feliz porque...
